channel.title: I Hate My Life, Sometimes lol
channel.description:
Ok so today under 10 freaking miles from my house, which starts in 2 hours..., is the UPROAR concert featuring my favorite bands of ALL FREAKING TIME... A7X, Disturbed, and Hellyeah. (Only the first two are my fav's, Hellyeah is ok.) Anywhom... It's only like $80 to get in and I can't go because god thinks it's funny to make me poor and not have a car to get there. It's like the almighty cow decided since I haven't made any cow models recently he wasn't gonna let me have any fun. (Yes, I am a Cowiest, and yes, to me it is a real religion)(<-lol). To anyone reading this, I was glad to waste 2 min of your time talking about the concert about to happen in two hours that I CAN'T GO TO!
OK SO IT DOESN'T GET LOCKED. We need something to discuss. Question of the day = What could you do to a cow to make it fly?
